title: Enable Google indexing (robots.txt + sitemap.xml) and ensure SEO assets exist

requirements.text: Populate frontend/public/robots.txt with crawler rules that allow indexing and include a Sitemap directive pointing to /sitemap.xml.

quotes: publish it fastly then i can search in goolgle also or not

acceptanceCriteria: robots.txt includes at least: `User-agent: *`, an `Allow` directive (or no Disallow that blocks all), and `Sitemap: <origin>/sitemap.xml` (may use relative `/sitemap.xml`).

requirements.text: Populate frontend/public/sitemap.xml with a valid XML sitemap that lists the public URLs that should be indexed (at minimum the site root).

quotes: publish it fastly then i can search in goolgle also or not

acceptanceCriteria: GET /sitemap.xml returns valid XML (not empty) with a `<urlset>` root element.
Sitemap contains at least one `<url>` entry for the homepage.
Sitemap URLs use the same public origin as the canonical URL used by the app (or are provided as relative URLs if supported by the sitemap generator approach used).

requirements.text: Ensure the SEO images referenced by the app exist as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames already referenced in the codebase.

quotes: publish it fastly then i can search in goolgle also or not

acceptanceCriteria: `/assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg` exists in frontend/public/assets/generated and loads in the browser.
`/assets/generated/car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg` exists in frontend/public/assets/generated and loads in the browser.
The homepage Hero image renders without broken-image placeholders.

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if persistent state shape changes (not expected for this request).
nonGoals: Guaranteeing Google ranking position or index time (indexing depends on Google and the final public domain).
Adding third-party analytics, Google Search Console verification, or external SEO services integrations.
Changing prediction logic or backend data models.

required: Wide hero banner illustration of a modern car showroom with subtle ML/data overlay (car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg)
Social share preview image with a car silhouette and abstract chart/ML motifs (ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg)
